title: Quri Qal-é Cave
content: Quri Qal-e Cave is one of the natural-national sites which is located between towns of Flavansar and Paveh. This cave is a type of lake-river cave placed amid the mountains in the Kermanshah region. The water in this cave flows out to be used by the people in Quri Qal-é region. In the rainy seasons, some parts of this cave are not accessible. Quri Qal-é cave deposits are of widely various kinds. The length of the lime columns from ceiling to floor of the cave sometimes reach to over 5m. Some beautiful little pools inside the cave are its most beautiful parts.
